name: Tendril (franbeb)
description:
A Mini Plant-Based Metroidvania where you grow to get sun and water and reach further places. Get water, get the flower

I recommend downloading it since the downloaded version works better

Comments and ratings are highly appreciated

Instructions:
  • Move the camera by draging or the mouse wheel
  • Earn energy faster by growin leaves in spots where there is sunlight
  • Grow further by growing roots near fire hidrants
  • Make a branch by pressing the arrow button or left click
  • Get the flower
Credits:

Sprites and Sounds by Kenney

Music by Johan Brodd
